about.title: Frontend Developer
about.description: Graduate of Sirius University in Mathematical Modeling for Petroleum Engineering. Proficient in frontend development. Won 4 hackathons, specializing in frontend solutions.

messenger.name: React Messenger
messenger.description: Developed as part of the VK Education course. Utilizes optimizations, memoization, token-based login. Technologies: React, Redux, CI/CD, TypeScript.

translator.name: Translator
translator.description: Web translator. Implemented as an exam project for the VK Education course within a limited timeframe. Technologies: React, TypeScript.

animals.name: Automatic Animal Image Filtering
animals.description: Solution for the 2024 International Hackathon. Detects animals in images. Technologies: React, React Context. Challenges: Rendering interactive bounding boxes over photos in the correct locations.

yappy.name: Video Duplicate Finder
yappy.description: Solution for the 2024 All-Russian Hackathon. Finds duplicate videos in a database. Technologies: React, React Context. Challenges: Implementing a custom video player.

semantic.name: Semantic Classification of Documents
semantic.description: Service that allows you to determine the class of a document (application, order, agreement, power of attorney, etc.) based on uploaded documents of various formats (PDF, XLSX, RTF, TXT, etc.). This solution helps companies reduce the burden on personnel involved in manual document validation by speeding up the first stage of filtering.

citizens.name: Processing Citizens' Appeals
citizens.description: Solution for the 2023 International Hackathon (2nd place). MVP in the form of a software module using artificial intelligence technologies to automatically classify incoming messages from citizens and highlight named entities.

rzhd.name: Acceptance of Accounting Documents
rzhd.description: Automated analysis of primary accounting documents in the register aimed at verification. In the register of acceptance and transfer of primary documents, it is proposed to implement a process of automated verification of the document for correctness and completeness of execution before passing it to an accountant for processing.

nonStatEq.name: Non-Stationary Diffusion Equation
nonStatEq.description: University project focused on solving the non-stationary diffusion equation using supercomputers.

navierStokes.name: Navier-Stokes Equation
navierStokes.description: Numerical solution of the Navier-Stokes Equation using the SIMPLE (Semi-Implicit Method for Pressure Linked Equations, Patankar & Spalding, 1972) method: Explicit Finite Volume Method.

skyrus.description: Russian startup in the field of oil and gas engineering. The company is developing an application for tracking data during casing running, as well as predicting it using artificial intelligence

bannerInfoComponent.description: Hello, I'm a passionate Frontend developer and part time freelancer with a keen eye for details.

education.name: Master's degree of Applied Math
education.description: Mathematical modeling in oil and gas engineering and biomedicine

education.name: Bachelor of Applied Math
education.description: Coursework - Using machine learning to predict the spread of COVID-19

education.name: Frontend
education.description: Main frontend technologies, includes React, Redux, CI/CD

education.name: Course of Python
education.description: Deep Python course from one of the biggest Russian IT Company “VK”

work_history.name: Junior Python Developer
work_history.description: Startup developing software for oil and gas engineers using AI
